topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a4118e63687253740005e0#post_55a4118e63687253740005e0

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a411a56368727f6f001d86#post_55a411a56368727f6f001d86
Okay so it was me, my friend and our moms (we were in our early teens at the time) and we went to botcon which is the official transformers convention
Well on one of the nights they have this nice dinner and a presentation with the guests like the voice actors and designers and whatnot and one of the halls has bingo

So we all go to the bingo because they have some pretty good prizes and the lady they always got to do it would always make a show of it
Well at one point she tosses a handful of decepticon pins into the audience and these two ladies fight over them and minutes later we hear one of them scream "YOU DO *NOT* CALL ME A BITCH" followed by the other woman grabbing her purse and leaving in a huff

So now everyone's startled and confused but we try to resume the bingo
A few minutes later a kid starts crying and a guy gets up and yells "IM SORRY I DIDNT MEAN TO-" and runs out of the room

After that we got out of there before some other shit happened
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
